designpaint

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • designpaint.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Base class for all shapes that can be drawn.
    See Also:
    Canvas, ShapeStrategy
